title: Welcome to Žodis
subtitle: A personal first Lithuanian library for real life.
points: Žodis is built around words and phrases that matter to you.
Add what you need, when you need it, or when you are curious.
This is not a fixed course, your library grows with you.

title: Hear it, then hear it again
subtitle: Audio is part of learning, not an extra.
points: Tap to play audio at normal speed.
Long press to play slowly.
Use playback to build confidence before you speak.

title: Notes are where meaning lives
subtitle: Notes add context, alternatives, and nuance.
points: Use Notes for explanations, extra meaning, and examples.
If there are multiple valid forms, Notes can show when to use each one.
Over time, Notes become your personal learning context.

title: Organise with RAG
subtitle: A simple way to mark what needs attention.
points: RAG helps you organise your library at a glance.
You can change RAG in Edit mode.
You can also tap the RAG icon in the Library to cycle it quickly.

title: Signing in
subtitle: Sign in unlocks cloud sync and multi device use.
points: You can sign in with Google or email.
Signing in lets you upload, download, and merge your library across devices.
If you requested beta access, make sure you sign in with the same email.

title: Sync is manual on purpose
subtitle: You decide exactly what happens to your data.
points: Upload replaces the cloud copy with what is on this device.
Download replaces what is on this device with what is in the cloud.
Merge is the safest option, it carefully combines both.

title: You are in control
subtitle: Clear actions, predictable outcomes.
points: Nothing syncs unless you choose it.
You can keep everything local if you prefer.
If you are unsure, use Merge first.
